text: Yevgeny (or Evgeni) Ignatov () may refer to several people: * Yevgeny Petrovich Ignatov, Hero of the Soviet Union * Yevgeny Ignatov (canoeist), Russian sprint canoeist * Yevgeny Ignatov (runner), retired long-distance runner from Bulgaria * Evgeni Ignatov (footballer), Bulgarian footballer
title: Yevgeny Ignatov
